scripts.postinstall: node -e "const knex = require('knex')(require('./knexfile.js')[process.env.NODE_ENV || 'production']); Promise.all([knex.migrate.latest(), knex.schema.hasTable('documents').then(exists => { if (exists) { return knex.schema.alterTable('documents', table => { if (!table.encryption_key) table.binary('encryption_key'); if (!table.cyber_center_id) table.integer('cyber_center_id').unsigned(); if (!table.otp) table.string('otp'); if (!table.s3_key) table.string('s3_key'); if (!table.status) table.string('status').defaultTo('pending'); }); } })]).then(() => { console.log('Migrations and schema updates completed successfully'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Migration failed:', err); process.exit(1); });"
